website_summaries.verdict: Add a touch of elegance to your favorite reading nook with a chair you'll lose track of time in.
pros: While we love the glamorous and timeless characteristics of this chair, it's also quite comfortable to throw on some slippers and curl up into
Customers note this chair holds up well over time
Also sits higher than it may appear to in pictures
cons: The chair's screw holes are not always symmetrical

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This Chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my new home office, as a sitting area and I am very happy with it. It is very comfortable and was easy to put together. I am typically not the one who put these types of things together as my husband usually does, however I was able to assemble it with no problems. The directions are very easy to follow. The size is perfect and I am overall extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These chairs arrived pretty fast considering they were not eligible for prime
customer_reviews.text: These chairs arrived pretty fast considering they were not eligible for prime. I was very impressed upon arrival on how much they look like the picture. I was worried with previous reviews that they would be short but they were perfect size and wide. I purchased 2 to have as accent chairs. They are not that comfortable which is fine for what I will be using them for. Cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! Its big, comfy and extremely quick and easy to put together. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upscale Look at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: As others have written, these chairs are relatively low to the ground but since I've put them in front of windows, that actually works out nicely so as not to block the light. They are sturdy, easy to assemble, and look more expensive than they are! I ordere the beige and it's the perfect neutral color! Cushions are firm but 'bouncy' and comfortable enough for extra seating when I'm entertaining. Would definitely recommend as they offer an upscale look at a reasonable price point!
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Teacher Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excited then disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive these chairs and then I opened the box. The chairs aren't the best craftsmanship. Staples were loose and used to hold fabric together. They're pretty but I don't know how long they may last.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wil

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is pulled so tight there are holes in the fabric on the seat that are very noticeable. Also, if you stand over the chair, you can see straight down to the one bolt, at least on the one we received and it can’t be tightened because as you can see in the 3rd picture, the side/base is as pressed in as it can be. My husband who has been putting together furniture for me for 15yrs (and even made solid wood chairs and a table that looks more finished that what you can find in a furniture store these days) couldn’t get the space any smaller
customer_reviews.author: AWS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. These are sturdy and elegant looking chairs. Check dimensions... they are fairly low to the floor. They make a great reading nook in our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these chairs and are nice, very low but nice. I had trouble with assembling both of the chairs. Followed directions exactly however it seems screw holes were not lined up on one chair and I ended up putting the side screws in first and then the middle. On the second chair one of the legs was about 1/2 off the floor causing it to wobble. I contacted support (they were friendly) and they sent me another leg which also did not match the other leg and also did not level the chair. They included with the replacement leg a thicker spacer that resolved the wobble issue.
customer_reviews.author: torrie

customer_reviews.title: Strange little chairs.
customer_reviews.text: How are these chairs bulky and small at the same time? They are short. But take up more room than they’re worth. I wish I had gone with something else honestly.
customer_reviews.author: IHeartAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, but Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some chairs for our bedroom sitting area to comfortably watch TV. I read lots of the reviews and understand people like different levels of comfort. I wanted something with some give and comfort--these do not. They look beautiful, but are not meant to be sat on for any length of time. They are great for forcing good posture. I placed them in my downstairs parlor and they are perfect, since they seldom get used.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chair, Sturdy Construction
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! Very easy to assemble, seems sturdy, no issues with any of the hardware or alignment of parts. This was purchased as an accent chair for our bedroom, so it hasn’t seen a lot of use, but is comfortable and good quality from what we have experienced. Upholstery is beautiful with no defects at this time. Material seems thick, so I have no concern with wearing over time (with our intended use).
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy to put together, looks great. don't like the drop on front sides, it has no cushion under the fabric.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute chair, love the color, great price, easy to assemble. But if you look closely at the photo, You can see that on the " front of the seat, both sides slope down." It wouldn't even be an issue for Me but I have a Dog and if He scratches it with his nails, it's defiantly going to tear. Because it's just a thin piece of linen, and a gap underneath. So I'm crossing My fingers, and going to the Dog grommer a lot more often. If You don't have pets, or small children. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Oatmeal Wingback Chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Arrived on time. True to color,Oatmeal(ish) matches with almost anything,great if going for a traditional look. Comfortable to sit on. Used scotch guard soon as I got it.Few Threads out;photographed. Didnt pull it too afraid it may put a hole! Sits "low",leg color is dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Caroway,Keyshema

customer_reviews.title: Not Fare the price changes
customer_reviews.text: Not fare, I ordered this Assent chair for 300 dlls and the next day was at 266dll. I will return it
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks beautiful and completes our front room. It is elegant and classy yet adds a homey touch. The ONE complaint about this chair is it is NOT comfortable whatsoever. Because this piece is in our front room and will not be sat in much, we are okay with it being rigid. It was very easy to put together, I do wish it wasn't such a hard chair, but for our needs it works beautifully. Luckily we have a very comfortable love seat in the same room to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: SLee

customer_reviews.title: The tufting is nice and tight
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an elegant looking chair without spending a fortune and I found it in this chair. The material is a woven linen - I chose the beige which is off-white woven with tan to give a beige look. The tufting is nice and tight. Shipment was on time and it took my partner about 25-30 min to assemble- he’s super handy. He did say that the holes drilled for the screws did not line up so he had to do some finagling. It’s very sturdy and attractive. The seat is very firm. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful chair! Very easy to assemble - It took ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful chair! Very easy to assemble - It took about 15 minutes for me to put together. The color is a little darker than seen in the pictures. It's more tan than beige. It still goes with my neutral décor so I had no issues with it. It's sturdy and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AKK

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks very nice. I took off one star because the chair is pretty firm. there is no give to the seat and I certainly won't be falling asleep in it!. Over all - very nice chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 16yrAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good looking
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of a pain to assemble because the legs don't match up to the holes properly, but once put together it is very nice and actually comfortable to sit on. I get lots of compliments and people are always surprised when they find out it was purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: FLbeachmom

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chair is well constructed and provide adequate support. The seat height is at least an inch lower than the couch that I matched it with. If seat height is a concern, then know that it is lower than the standard height of a dinning chair.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Very short but sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a regular size wing chair, then this one is not it! This is a well made and beautiful chair but sits very low to the ground. I am keeping it but ordering another as this was intend to be a statement piece and it just isn't. Took two people about 20 mins to put it together. Again, very well made and beautiful, but it feels more like a child chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee R

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Chairs
customer_reviews.text: They look great and add a nice touch to the room. Installing is easy unless you don’t line up the pieces together well. They are durable strong chairs, not the comfiest but they aren’t intended to be used for long periods at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are very pretty and good quality for the price. They are comfortable to sit, but we don’t use them often due to them being in our formal sitting room. They are a beautiful ivory/taupe color. They added the perfect touch and softness to our room.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: I'm putting baby in the corner
customer_reviews.text: This chair had fast delivery and was easy to assemble. If you are looking for comfort this isn't the chair. If you are looking to make a room pop or just for decor...go for it. It is very hard to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Smith

customer_reviews.title: Damaged tens received/ poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Stains all over the chair. One on the arm, one on the top, and one on the seat. I will say that i saw this exact same chair on overstock.com for double the price. Even with the same stock photo. Had there not been stains, I would have assembled the chair and likely been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Sits low to floor. Color is more off white than beige.
customer_reviews.text: Chair looks nice and was easy to assemble! It does sit low to floor. Light weight chair there are no springs in seat it's just hollow. As much as I like the look of this chair, not sure if it would last with everyday use. I purchased as an accent piece.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Simons

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy but made well.
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this piece but it was pretty easy to assemble, and is made well. It isn't really comfy and kind of stiff to sit in without having arms, but it does look good if that's all you need it for.
customer_reviews.author: janakaymaguire

customer_reviews.title: It is good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is good deal for the price. Comfort is average. One issue is that it is so light weight it moves when you sit down if placed on a wooden floor. I corrected that with small rubber like floor protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Frizzy blonde

customer_reviews.title: Pretty chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair....but did have a few flaws I'm not happy about. Price should be way lower since damaged
customer_reviews.author: Breebee

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t  like the fabric but stuck with it
customer_reviews.text: Design was good , easy instructions to assemble but the fabric wasn’t so grt compared to other chairs I bought from amazon earlier.. but unable to return as i have to drop it n its too bulky to fit in my car..
customer_reviews.author: preety

customer_reviews.title: Definately recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my mom. She loves it. This product is very easy to assemble, extremely comfortable, image is as seen in the photo. It perfect for any room, she placed it in her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Taneisha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is really nice and stately! I did return it because I was looking for a velvet chair and somehow I did not realize it was fabric not velvet. But the chair itself was great, just not what I was looking for specifically in the material.
customer_reviews.author: *Jewel*

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous accent chair
customer_reviews.text: Much better than we expected. It took my husband about 30 minutes to assemble. From start to finish which includes unpacking from the box. Thinking about ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Denise DiTusa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price. The fabric isnhigh quality and the color is amazing. They are very comfortable and low to the ground. Easy to put together and will add to any decor.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Assembly wasn't the easiest but I got the job done by myself. They are actually really comfortable and I get so many compliments. I love these chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two chairs and love them... they were put together quickly and without a problem! Packing could not have been better. The chairs are beautiful. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair...Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Great look, built nicely, easy to put together, come s with all the necessary items to build. Love it! Great for bedrooms or lightly used rooms. Since I bought the light beige chair I did put two layers of scotch guard and it appears to have worked well.
customer_reviews.author: mellissa b.

customer_reviews.title: it is more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: this chair was more than I thought it would be. it is more beautiful in person. easy to assemble and it was used in a half hour. love it and the price was something I could not pass up. great product.
customer_reviews.author: michaelalanjunak

customer_reviews.title: Pretty 😮
customer_reviews.text: Pretty chair, nice and big could be more cushion-y also make sure you tighten it enough it was wobbling on threee sides because one was tightened enough but we fixed that Ez
customer_reviews.author: Milky Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! A little difficult to align holes to screw in the cushion with the back support of the chair. It was well worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki DeVito

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and look great. Be advised they do sit low to the ground. We will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: I have just recently been married, and my husband and I have purchased quite a few pieces of furniture from amazon with all great success! When the chair arrived, the box was fully intact. But upon unboxing, the legs of the chair were completely chipped and beat up. I have always loved all the furniture I have ordered from amazon, as it is typically strategically wrapped to protect the integrity of the item. I’m very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M

customer_reviews.title: High end with out the high price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair! Everyone thinks it’s so expensive from the high end elegant tufted look. Easy to put together. All the holes lined up perfectly and it took about 15 mins. I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Wade

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: The color is not exactly as pictured but I still like it. Its more yellow in person
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned after reading reviews of how low they sit, but the thick cushion compensates for this and they measure the same as my sofa seat Soooo attractive! Total deal
customer_reviews.author: L. Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this chair, makes a great deal of music for less money. I ordered it in beige and I'm gonna get 2nd one as well. I can only recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Radka

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair a lot. Bought for spare bedroom/office and it is perfect size. Easy to assemble, well made, sits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s darker than I expected it to be. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Quite low on the legs, would have love it if it’s a little bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: MheggY

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Firm seating however the legs are really ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Firm seating however the legs are really short so it sits low. Originally bought 2 and only kept 1due to the low seating.
customer_reviews.author: Rayerrica

customer_reviews.title: pretty for its price
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to screw everything because the holes dont align. Other than that looks great 👍
customer_reviews.author: Chyrelle Degala @bookstamom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so pretty
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in our living room
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: great quality, sophisticated look
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two beige ones and they are gorgeous! great quality, sophisticated look. No arms but they are sturdy and comfy enough for a 5'11" and 6'2" tall wife and husban :)
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: For the price its ok. I have had it ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price its ok. I have had it for almost a year and it hasn't broke yet. the legs are very fragile though. The legs wobble when an adult sits in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Rios

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and feels comfortable. Exactly what I was looking for. I am 5’9 and is not low to the floor where it makes it hard to get up plus it’s a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It was pretty easy to put together and it’s beautiful. I paired it with a round ottoman, and I’m in love! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Perfect occasional chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. The price is low, the quality is good and it looks great! It was easy to put together and does exactly what its supposed to do, look like a nice occasional chair for my livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: Chero37

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for the price. Color was a little lighter than described but it worked fine for me. Ordered two, first one went together fine but the screws and hole did not line up on the second one. Struggled a bit but finally managed to get it put together.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L.

customer_reviews.title: Good but old
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice, comfy, easy to assemble but it's old. It has small holes between the strings. overall I like it but not if I look at it very closely
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice chair, but legs are very short compared to height and size of the chair
customer_reviews.author: monique robbins

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: nice looking and good quality for price. Only bought for light use as deco chair
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to assemble and a perfect accent chair for my reading nook. The cushion is a bit poofy, but I am sure it will flatten a bit with us. Surprisingly comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Pallo

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs, don’t hold much weight
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! We bought 2 and love them. After a few times of sitting in it we can see the fabric start to tear. We are small adults as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F

customer_reviews.title: Great price and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived exactly as described. It was very easy to put together by myself and looks great! It’s fairly comfortable and is pretty great quality for the price! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mariah schubert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful. The quality is great especially for the price and the material is a nice linen look. They are sturdy too and the cushions are firm which I like but may be a bit too fir for some. Overall great product and love how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are well made and comfortable. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are well made and comfortable. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the dimensions are not what was described. They are about 2-3 inches smaller than the measurements given.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Just plain gorgeous!! I bought two beige for my Entryway.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous..OMG these chairs are so beautiful! It made my foyer look so rich and elegant. We set them up on Christmas Eve and they made such a big difference. We got a lot of compliments. I just find myself looking at it every time. They were easy to put together and they seem to be strong. The material is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: I have immediately noticed it to be a favorite place to sit for my clients
customer_reviews.text: using this in my new studio, I have immediately noticed it to be a favorite place to sit for my clients. met ALL expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Low to the ground, comfortable and firm. Works ok for the guest room
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a great addition to my living room. It is very sturdy and feel pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: HonorPupil

customer_reviews.title: Decorative Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair. It looks as good in real as it does in pic. Easy assembly (really) and sturdy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. Worth the price. Really love it!! Super easy to put together. It’s perfect for my studio/bedroom setting. Shipping was very FAST!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sitting room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sitting room. Not comfy enough to be a "favorite" chair, but works for what I am using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Close to the floor but cute. Had to buy small pillow for back. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We got this chair to replace one our cat destroyed in my daughter's bedroom after she went away to college. It was easy to put together and so far we've kept the cat away.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Case

customer_reviews.title: but it is a nice big chair for 5'3 100lb
customer_reviews.text: It was real hard for me 1 person to put it together and I still cannot put the last screw in it... but it is a nice big chair for 5'3 100lb me
customer_reviews.author: ZHEN

customer_reviews.title: Clarice Wing Back Chair
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair, great price. May not hold up for every day use, but looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: DonsGinny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Such a great purchase for this cheap price
customer_reviews.author: samantha scarberry

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, easy assembly, looks very good! Seat is lower than most and no arms so it makes a nice accent chair rather than piece of comfy living room furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! It was easy to assemble and looks awesome. Perfect accent piece.
customer_reviews.author: LFamily5

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look great in our newly-decorated study! They were so easy to put together, very sturdy, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this chair
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this chair. It is very comfortable. IT was a little difficult to screw in one of the connecting screws so make sure that you align the base and top when putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and larger then expected , wasn’t as difficult as most people made it out to be to put together. Pretty high quality material considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great fit for my bedroom, too low for a living room.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: It is a comfy chair a little low to the ground but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I was looking for. It is a comfy chair a little low to the ground but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: KathyG

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the chair I purchased. It was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Cammiso

customer_reviews.title: New modern or original (antique) lower seated furniture Took some ...
customer_reviews.text: New modern or original (antique) lower seated furniture Took some getting use to But look has grown on me
customer_reviews.author: where's the heat!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look amazing in our living room! SUGGESTED BUY :)
customer_reviews.author: CJ Brunson

customer_reviews.title: wish they sat higher feel like they are for children
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very low to the ground, wish they sat higher feel like they are for children. Pretty chair, shame they sit so low!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Very nice looking. Easy to put together. Not meant for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: JASON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I get tons of compliments on them. They are comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: ctappleflash

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of them - they are beautiful chairs. However
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them - they are beautiful chairs. However, they are really hard to put together - it should be easier - once together, they make a statement but before that could happen, I had a few statements for the chairs and putting them together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair!!! Everyone loves it and like to sit it in!!!! Beautiful and sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! But a little hard screwing in the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cannot return with this buyer-Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok for an accent chair but not for regular use as its super uncomfortable to sit on. The holes do not line up correctly for assembly so putting together was very difficult. Also....seller does not seem to do returns. I ordered an extra chair on accident and was told initially that I could return but not for almost another week. Fed Ex never picked up on the date promised by the seller. When I emailed about the issue another attempt was never made. Stuck with a big chair I do not need and am now paying for an expensive extra item I now cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I was worried the seat would be too short in length but it is perfect and the back is a great height. I got the beige color and it has a nice sandy look to it and blends in perfectly with my room. Putting it together is kind of a pain with the bolts in the bottom but it works eventually and feels very secure. Very high quality chair.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks even better in person! Packaged very well and super easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Ejgpink

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is too short. I wouldn't buy it for my living room again. I'm going to have to find another spot for it because it sits too low. The color is perfect and I love the fabric but the legs are black, I want to find different legs for it. It was packaged great and it arrived in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs at great! We had no issue putting them together. We bought two and they are indentical and so no need to worry about mismatching or quality from one to another. For the price they are great! I spent over a month looking for a chair that I could get two of that would work well by our front window and these are beyond expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C (yo)

customer_reviews.title: Assembly blind luck
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble attaching chair seat to chair back. It's blind luck to get holes and bolts to match up. Also, not enough plastic washers included to help with wobbliness.
customer_reviews.author: debbie pick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chairs
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant about buying furniture online, but after spending time researching our options, and thinking of having to wait several weeks for delivery, we decided to take a chance and purchase these chairs for our living room. It took only 2 days from ordering them to having them delivered and assembled. Putting them together is not difficult, just make sure to line the back and the seat correctly and follow the simple directions. The fabric is linen. The chairs are really nice. Not the most comfortable chairs I've ever sat in, but we are pleased that we purchased them. very good looking. We are glad we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Joan W.T.

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home Toddman High Back Club Chair, Light Beige
product_meta.description: Color:Light BeigeThe Clarice Accent Chair is a perfect addition for any room in your home. With its tufted accent and curved wingback feature, this elegant chair will enhance the look of any room it is placed in.Whether used during a fireside evening or for lounging, the Clarice High Back Accent Chair will make a charming addition to your home.
feature_bullets: Wingback Chair: Our Clarice Tall Wingback Fabric Accent Chair in light beige will meet all your indoor furniture needs. This high-class lounge chair pairs perfectly with an ottoman and comes in a variety of colors to suit any style.

Classic Arm Less Style: At Great Deal Furniture, we bring you the best furniture available. Our stylish chair has timeless wing features on its high back. Its curved design is the perfect focal point for any room, and makes a great location for sitting, reading, and relaxing.

High-Quality Fabric: To give your space a cozy yet traditional feel, we created our Clarice chair with a tasteful, tufted design. Our chair boasts a linen and polyester fabric blend and durable wood legs, making this chair easy to care for and built to last. This seat will soon be your new favorite spot in the house.

Living Room & More: Our elegant wingback chair is the perfect addition to any house or apartment. Use it in your TV room, office, dining room, or bedroom. Adults and kids alike will love this new luxury chair that can be moved easily to fit your space. This modern seating option will add a touch of classic beauty to your home.

Dimensions: Knowing the dimensions of new furniture is essential to ensure that you get something that fits your needs and your space. The chair itself is 27.25” L x 33.75” W x 38.50” H, and the seat is 21.25” D x 27.5” W x 18” H. With this chic chair, you’ll always have a comfortable place to rest after a long day. Light assembly required.
